posts.post_text: February 17, 2016 at 10:59 PM#21. Make the button "Temp" instead of "Flash"2. Set the cue's Fade time to 0.3. Set the executor's "Off-Time" to the desired fade out length. This is done by pressing [Edit], tapping the executor in question, pressing [Esc], and then your 4th encoder will be "Off-Time".
